thread.title: BRIEF-Inspire Says Entered A Multi-Year Strategic Relationship With Shell Energy North America

title: BRIEF-Inspire Says Entered A Multi-Year Strategic Relationship With Shell Energy North America

organizations.name: shell energy north america reuters staff

text: February 14, 2018 / 2:57 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago BRIEF-Inspire Says Entered A Multi-Year Strategic Relationship With Shell Energy North America Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 14 (Reuters) - Inspire: * INSPIRE, A CONSUMER TECHNOLOGY CO, SAYS IT HAS ENTERED INTO A MULTI-YEAR STRATEGIC RELATIONSHIP WITH SHELL ENERGY NORTH AMERICA * INSPIRE SAYS UNDER ARRANGEMENT, SHELL WILL PROVIDE INSPIRE WITH A RANGE OF SERVICES, INCLUDING A CREDIT LINE FOR TRADING & A REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
